Description: Giant boss monsters with health bars. Type words rapidly to deal damage. Boss attacks require multiple choice defense. Final blow needs perfect pronunciation. Health bars, damage numbers, victory fanfare.
Zombies approach from the screen. Each zombie has a word floating above it. Type the word correctly to shoot and kill the zombie before it reaches you. Wave-based survival with escalating difficulty.
Pokemon-style collection. Catch monsters by typing their names. Battle using multiple choice attacks. Pronounce to command special moves. Evolution through mastery. Gotta catch 'em all.

Casino betting game. English word on top, 4 translation choices below. Bet all your chips on ONE answer. Wrong = lose everything. Right = play baccarat hand with 65/35 player odds. Pure gambling dopamine.
RPG dungeon exploration. Enemies attack with vocabulary challenges. Multiple choice for defense (block), typing for attack (sword), pronunciation for magic spells. Loot drops, character progression.
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire format. Multiple choice with lifelines (50/50, phone friend, ask audience). Money ladder with checkpoints. Escalating stakes create intense pressure.
Waves of zombies. Type to shoot (pistol), multiple choice to reload, pronunciation to call airstrikes. Survive as many nights as possible. Permadeath mode. Survival horror tension.
Battle royale with vocabulary. 100 words enter, 1 survives. Eliminate words by correctly using them. Storm closes on wrong answers. Last word standing wins. High stakes elimination.
Bracket elimination. 64 players. Each match is typing speed competition on same vocabulary pack. Winner advances. Spectator mode. Prize pool. Tournament bracket drama.
Real-time 1v1 vocabulary battle. Both players get same word. First to type correctly wins point. Best of 5 rounds. ELO ranking system. Competitive ladder climbing.
Space Invaders clone. Aliens descend with words attached. Type the word to fire a laser and destroy the alien. Faster typing = higher combo multiplier. Boss aliens need longer phrases.
Guitar Hero style. Words scroll down lanes. Type them in rhythm with the music beat. Perfect timing = bonus points. Miss = combo break. Multiple difficulty tracks. Music + learning.
Racing game. Car accelerates based on typing speed. Type words that appear on road signs to boost. Typos cause slowdown. Finish line requires certain word count. Racing adrenaline.
Play as lawyer. Type objections rapidly. Multiple choice for legal strategy. Pronounce closing arguments for jury persuasion. Win cases to progress career. Phoenix Wright vibes.
Three-stage race. Stage 1: Multiple choice sprint. Stage 2: Typing cycling. Stage 3: Pronunciation marathon. Combined time determines winner. Olympic format. Endurance test.
Sail the seas. Naval battles require typing cannon fire. Board enemy ships with multiple choice combat. Pronounce to rally crew. Treasure maps with vocab puzzles. Adventure awaits.
Map with buried treasure. Dig spots have vocabulary locks. Solve multiple choice to dig. Find treasure chests that require typing passwords. Voice-activated secret doors. Discovery dopamine.
Plan and execute vocabulary heists. Multiple choice for planning phase. Type to hack security. Pronounce to coordinate team. Stealth or action approach. Heist movie thrills.
Type to the beat of music. Words appear on music staff. Hit keys in rhythm. Miss timing = miss note. Song unlocks based on vocabulary mastery. DDR for your fingers.
TTS sings a word/phrase slowly. You must pronounce it back in time with the rhythm. Pitch and timing matter. Party game potential. Score based on accuracy. Sing your heart out.

Voice-based fighting game. Characters fight when you pronounce words. Better pronunciation = stronger attacks. Combo system for word chains. Fighting game aesthetics. Street Fighter meets language.
Stranded on island. Hunt food (typing), build shelter (multiple choice), signal rescue (pronunciation). Day/night cycle. Weather events. Story progression. Survival simulation.
Cards are vocabulary words with point values. Hit to get more words, but must translate each correctly to keep points. Bust if wrong translation. Beat the dealer to 21.
